price: Afei Yenyanee mo wͻ mo wuo no akyi sεdeε mobeyi (Me) ayε.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnākum min baʿdi mawtikum laʿallakum tashkurūna
